forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 8C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
